parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Set to Default
parameter.description: If value is set to 0XFF (255), device set to default

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Amount of decimals
parameter.description:
If value is set to 1 the info shall be presented with 1 decimal

Overview

0,1,2,3 amount of decimals. Every Amount higher then 3 shall be printed as 3 decimals.

parameter.name: config_3_2
parameter.label: 3: Power Limit
parameter.description:
The device will shut down when it reaches an amount higher then defined (W)

Overview

0 = no power limit.

1-4500 are acceptable values and can be used, everything above the 4500 shall be changed to 4500.

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Start up with last known socket status
parameter.description: If 0 then the device will always be off, when 1-255 it will emain the last known state

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Auto report %
parameter.description: The value will change when the % is changed.

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Auto report Watt
parameter.description: The value will change when the Watt is changed.

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Auto report time
parameter.description: The time between 2 of the meter rerport

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Relais delay time
parameter.description:
The time that needs to pass before the next state change

Overview

Value * 10 miliseconds

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Led indicator
parameter.description:
The state of the Led compared to the relais state

Overview

0 = Indication Led never off

1 = led ON when relais ON

2 = led On when relais OFF
